name: Rate Limit
Description: Controlling API request rates to prevent overuse.

name: Pod Limits
Description: Defining CPU & memory limits for containers.

name: HPA
Description: Automatically scales pods based on CPU/memory.

name: Pod Aff
Description: Controlling pod placement based on affinity rules.

name: Sidecar Cache
Description: Proxy-based caching at the service level.

name: App Cache
Description: Using Redis for low-latency in-memory storage.

name: Conc-Scale
Description: Scaling based on concurrent request limits.

name: Min Rep
Description: Setting a minimum number of running instances.

name: Max Rep
Description: Limiting the number of running instances.

name: Mem Cache
Description: Temporary data storage within an application.
